thread.title: BRIEF-Kirkland's Inc Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.79

title: BRIEF-Kirkland's Inc Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.79
text: 29 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Kirkland's Inc Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.79 Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Kirkland’s Inc: * KIRKLAND’S REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2017 RESULTS * Q4 SALES $224.6 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $225 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.80 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 3 TO 5 PERCENT * SEES 2018 COMPARABLE STORE SALES INCREASE IN RANGE OF 1% TO 2% * CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN FISCAL 2018 ARE ESTIMATED TO RANGE BETWEEN $26 MILLION AND $29 MILLION * ON A 13-WEEK COMPARISON, QTRLY COMPARABLE STORE SALES INCREASED 2.0% AGAINST A DECLINE OF 4.6% IN PRIOR YEAR
